ROOT.GetTransChannel:
select replace(tc.tower_name,'/n','
'),replace(tc.tower_name_other,'/n','
'), distance,round(tc_capacity,1), tc.region_name,tc.through_area,id,dcline_min_distance, longitude1,latitude1,longitude2,latitude2,longitude3,latitude3,longitude4,latitude4,round(tc_length,1) from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_CON_TRANSCHANNEL_B_HB tc --join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_region region on tc.region=region.code WHERE tc.OWNER={0} {{1}} order by id
ROOT.ConnectTransChannel: select distinct menber_id,line_name,line.voltage_type,vol.name,t1.model||'-'||t2.model as towerqujian,start_st_id,end_st_id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_CON_TRANSCHANNEL_r_HB line join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype vol on line.voltage_type=vol.code join (SELECT ID,start_st_id,end_st_id FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B UNION SELECT ID,start_st_id,end_st_id FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B) dl on line.menber_id=dl.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b t1 on line.start_tower_id = t1.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b t2 on line.end_tower_id = t2.id where transchannel_id = {0} order by voltage_type
ROOT.GetAcLineVol: select distinct line.voltage_type from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_CON_TRANSCHANNEL_r_HB line join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype vol on line.voltage_type=vol.code join ( SELECT ID,start_st_id,end_st_id FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B) dl on line.menber_id=dl.id order by voltage_type
ROOT.TransChannelLineRate: select distinct menber_id,line_name,voltage_type,'' as rate,'' as ratetype,'' overload,''xishu,'' yudu,''value from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_CON_TRANSCHANNEL_r_HB line join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype vol on line.voltage_type=vol.code where transchannel_id = {0} order by voltage_type
ROOT.TransChannelLineTower: select id,model from ( select distinct t1.id,t1.model from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_CON_TRANSCHANNEL_r_HB line left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b t1 on line.start_tower_id = t1.id where transchannel_id = {0} union all select distinct t2.id,t2.model from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_CON_TRANSCHANNEL_r_HB line left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b t2 on line.end_tower_id = t2.id where transchannel_id = {0} ) where model is not null order by id
ROOT.GetLines: select menber_id from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_CON_TRANSCHANNEL_r_HB WHERE transchannel_id = {0}
ROOT.GetTransChannelLine: select transchannel_id,menber_id ,t1.towerno , t2.towerno from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_CON_TRANSCHANNEL_r_HB line left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b t1 on line.start_tower_id = t1.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b t2 on line.end_tower_id = t2.id order by transchannel_id
